attributes.action: More help with childcare costs for working parents, not for those who don't work.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop this nonsense 'terrific for two's' scheme and give the free hours to those who can prove they work a certain amount of hours per week.
 It should not be based on what benefits are received but instead on how much parents work.
 How are we supposed to stay above the poverty line if the cost of childcare keeps rising above minimum wage per day.
 Please stop penalising those who want a career and a future for our children.
